content.rendered:
Medical Tourism All-inclusive plans: medical procedure, travel, accommodation, transportation and post-op care See Plans Contact Us Excellent professionals A comprehensive team of professionals specialized in different areas and extensive experience Our Team Book an Appointment

Effective, Reliable and Safe

Quick Recovery, Excellent Results

Procedures

The Obesity and Aging Clinic (Clínica de Obesidad y Envejecimiento) has become a reference in Colombia and Latin America on obesity, overweight and aging issues. We have a medical team with all the experience, human warmth, technology and knowledge.

Procedures
Book an Appointment
Laser Megalipolysis
Mammoplasty
Laser Lipolysis
Butt Lift

Our Clinic

We are a comprehensive team of professionals specialized in different areas of medicine, whose experience has been focused on improving the quality of life of our patients, giving them the best of ourselves, to give them exact answers to their obesity and aging problems.

At the head of the team we are pleased to have the expertise and scientific knowledge of Dr. Gabriel Cubillos, who is our scientific director.

  • High quality service
  • Laser technology
  • Effective Treatments
  • Modern infrastructure
  • Highly trained human talent
More Information

Results

Diego – Discovery Channel

Lida – Discovery Channel

Brigitte – Discovery Channel

See More

Medical Tourism

We have created a series of benefits for our patients’ stay in the capital city of Colombia. Enjoy a journey accompanied by our guidance while meeting your health and wellness goals.

More Information

Infrastructure

More Information
